ing: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate, undiluted
2 liters ginger ale, or as needed
1 cup orange sherbet, or to taste (optional)
des: "A delicious fruity punch. Great for your next party."
ins: Stir cranberry juice, pineapple juice, tea, and orange juice concentrate in a large punch bowl until orange juice is dissolved. Top with ginger ale until bowl is filled. Scoop orange sherbet into punch before serving.
